# AI Automation Ecosystem Project Planning

**Summary:** **Conversation Overview**

The user is working on an AI Automation Ecosystem (AAE) project that integrates OpenMemory, n8n workflows, Google Ap

## **Implementation Strategy**

learnings.details:
**Risk Assessment** - Flag potential issues for review

## **Implementation Strategy**

**Phase 1: Core Content Workflow**
- Set up Workflow 1 for basic content processing
- Test with Module 1 content from your documents
- Validate output quality and formatting

**Phase 2: Quality & Publishing**
- Implement Workflows 2 and 3
- Integrate with ABSORB and Academy LMS platforms
- Test end-to-end content creation process

**Phase 3: Analytics & Optimisation**
- Deploy Workflows 4 and 5
- Establish feedback loops for continuous improvement
- Scale across all 7 modules

## **Key Integrations Required**

**APIs Needed:**
- Claude/Anthropic API (content processing)
- Jan/Genspark API (research validation)  
- ABSORB LMS API (course deployment)
- Google Workspace APIs (Drive, Sheets, TTS)
- Canva API (visual generation)
- WordPress API (blog publishing)

**Webhook Endpoints:**
- Content upload triggers
- Course completion events
- Assessment submissions
- Quality review completions

## **Monitoring & Success Metrics**

**Content Creation Metrics:**
- Time from upload to published module
- Quality score consistency across modules
- Review cycle efficiency

**Learning Effectiveness:**
- Module completion rates
- Assessment scores
- Learner feedback quality

**Business Impact:**
- Course enrollment conversion
- Revenue per automated hour
- Content reusability across platforms

These workflows will transform your manual course creation process into a largely automated system that maintains quality while dramatically reducing time investment. Each workflow builds on your existing AAE infrastructure and leverages the structured approach you've developed with Jan and Fred. **Social Media Scheduler** - Generate and schedule promotional content

## **Enhanced Image Generation Strategy**

**Node 5 Detail - Image Generation Router:**

**Gemini TTI Branch:**
- Medical accuracy focus for clinical imagery
- Professional healthcare aesthetics
- Australian healthcare compliance visuals
- Outputs: High-res images for course slides

**Qolaba Branch:**
- Creative interpretations and metaphorical concepts
- Abstract representations of complex topics
- Diverse visual styles for different learning preferences
- Outputs: Alternative perspectives and creative visuals

**Gamma
